abstract: Amazon announced a deal for access to part of Universal’s film library, its second such pact in streaming video in as many weeks.
snippet: Amazon announced a deal for access to part of Universal’s film library, its second such pact in streaming video in as many weeks.
lead_paragraph: Amazon, the online retailing giant, announced a deal with NBCUniversal for access to part of Universal Pictures’ film library on Thursday, its second such pact in the streaming video space in as many weeks.

headline.main: In Deal With NBC, Amazon Seeks to Widen Its Video Streaming Service
headline.print_headline: In Deal With NBC, Amazon Seeks to Widen Its Video Streaming Service
